HDG.FS.content: all metaphysics rests on fundamental experience of being specific to thinker: for Kant, experience of being as “Nature” > experience (the key word of CPR), for Kant, in scientific sense, mathematical physics (science par excellence since modern times) > still today, biology becomes biophysics, can predict/prepare mastery of genesis of man, anthropology becomes anthropo-physics, appearance of cybernetics
